title: ALIGN and SALT Projects - STLA Teaching & Learning Showcase - SIT

meta.description: A list of projects funded by the Applied Learning and Innovation Grant (ALIGN) and SIT Advancement of Learning and Teaching (SALT) Grant.

text_lines: A list of approved ALIGN & SALT projects that promote effective applied learning, adoption of education technology and innovation for teaching and learning at SIT.
Remote Assessment and Proctoring using Intelligent Devices (RAPID)
Interactive Anatomy Learning - Virtually Engaging Students with QR Coded Anatomy Specimen
Enhancing Teaching and Learning of Evidence Based Practice via Game-based Learning
Enhancing Students’ Work Performance Skills Using Technology and Peer Teaching
Training Physiotherapy Students in Clinical Questioning and Reasoning Using AI
Learn More with SIT Teaching and Learning Academy
ALIGN supports academic staff’s effort to innovate and strength teaching and learning.
A list of projects supported by the Ministry of Education's Tertiary Education Research Fund.
A list of projects funded by the Harnessing Applied Learning Online (HALO) grant.
Connect with us to request support for or start a discussion about the teaching practice at SIT.
Singapore Institute of Technology. All Rights Reserved.
